entry.sentence: US Highway 95 seemed to stretch like a dead straight line in a northwesterly direction through the desert .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP US) (NNP Highway) (CD 95)) (VP (VBD seemed) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB stretch) (PP (IN like) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ dead) (JJ straight) (NN line)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT a) (JJ northwesterly) (NN direction))))) (PP (IN through) (NP (DT the) (NN desert))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nn(Highway-2, US-1) nsubj(seemed-4, Highway-2) xsubj(stretch-6, Highway-2) num(Highway-2, 95-3) root(ROOT-0, seemed-4) aux(stretch-6, to-5) xcomp(seemed-4, stretch-6) det(line-11, a-8) amod(line-11, dead-9) amod(line-11, straight-10) prep_like(stretch-6, line-11) det(direction-15, a-13) amod(direction-15, northwesterly-14) prep_in(line-11, direction-15) det(desert-18, the-17) prep_through(stretch-6, desert-18)

entry.sentence: On the map , it described numerous kinks and bends , but this was only clearly visible due to the reduced scale .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (PP (IN On) (NP (DT the) (NN map))) (, ,) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD described) (NP (JJ numerous) (NNS kinks) (CC and) (NNS bends)))) (, ,) (CC but) (S (NP (DT this)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB only)) (ADJP (RB clearly) (JJ visible)) (PP (RB due) (TO to) (NP (DT the) (VBN reduced) (NN scale))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(map-3, the-2) prep_on(described-6, map-3) nsubj(described-6, it-5) root(ROOT-0, described-6) amod(kinks-8, numerous-7) dobj(described-6, kinks-8) dobj(described-6, bends-10) conj_and(kinks-8, bends-10) nsubj(visible-17, this-13) cop(visible-17, was-14) advmod(visible-17, only-15) advmod(visible-17, clearly-16) conj_but(described-6, visible-17) det(scale-22, the-20) amod(scale-22, reduced-21) prep_due_to(visible-17, scale-22)

entry.sentence: If one drove along it , the windings were so extremely long that one hardly noticed them .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (SBAR (IN If) (S (NP (PRP one)) (VP (VBD drove) (PRT (RP along)) (NP (PRP it))))) (, ,) (NP (DT the) (NNS windings)) (VP (VBD were) (ADJP (ADJP (RB so) (RB extremely) (JJ long)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP one)) (ADVP (RB hardly)) (VP (VBD noticed) (NP (PRP them))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: mark(drove-3, If-1) nsubj(drove-3, one-2) advcl(long-12, drove-3) prt(drove-3, along-4) dobj(drove-3, it-5) det(windings-8, the-7) nsubj(long-12, windings-8) cop(long-12, were-9) advmod(long-12, so-10) advmod(long-12, extremely-11) root(ROOT-0, long-12) mark(noticed-16, that-13) nsubj(noticed-16, one-14) advmod(noticed-16, hardly-15) ccomp(long-12, noticed-16) dobj(noticed-16, them-17)

entry.sentence: The sun blazed down as a glaring fireball from an intensely blue sky , in which not even the smallest cloud was to be discovered , which promised relief from the scorching heat .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NN sun)) (VP (VBD blazed) (PRT (RP down)) (PP (IN as) (NP (NP (DT a) (VBG glaring) (NN fireball)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (DT an) (ADJP (RB intensely) (JJ blue)) (NN sky)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHPP (IN in) (WHNP (WDT which))) (S (NP (NP (RB not) (RB even)) (NP (DT the) (JJS smallest) (NN cloud))) (VP (VBD was) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB be) (VP (VBN discovered)))))))) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (VP (VBD promised) (NP (NN relief)) (PP (IN from) (NP (DT the) (VBG scorching) (NN heat))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(sun-2, The-1) nsubj(blazed-3, sun-2) root(ROOT-0, blazed-3) prt(blazed-3, down-4) det(fireball-8, a-6) amod(fireball-8, glaring-7) prep_as(blazed-3, fireball-8) det(sky-13, an-10) advmod(blue-12, intensely-11) amod(sky-13, blue-12) prep_from(fireball-8, sky-13) prep_in(was-22, sky-13) nsubj(promised-28, sky-13) rel(was-22, in-15) neg(even-18, not-17) nsubj(was-22, even-18) xsubj(discovered-25, even-18) det(cloud-21, the-19) amod(cloud-21, smallest-20) dep(even-18, cloud-21) rcmod(sky-13, was-22) aux(discovered-25, to-23) auxpass(discovered-25, be-24) xcomp(was-22, discovered-25) rcmod(sky-13, promised-28) dobj(promised-28, relief-29) det(heat-33, the-31) amod(heat-33, scorching-32) prep_from(promised-28, heat-33)

entry.sentence: Billowing heat rose from the asphalt , blurring everything more than half a mile away as if behind a curtain of water .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (VBG Billowing) (NN heat)) (VP (VBD rose) (PP (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN asphalt)) (, ,) (VP (VBG blurring) (NP (NN everything)) (ADVP (NP (NP (QP (JJR more) (IN than) (PDT half))) (NP (DT a) (NN mile))) (RB away))))) (CONJP (RB as) (IN if)) (PP (IN behind) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN curtain)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN water))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: amod(heat-2, Billowing-1) nsubj(rose-3, heat-2) nsubj(rose-3', heat-2) root(ROOT-0, rose-3) conj_as(rose-3, rose-3') det(asphalt-6, the-5) prep_from(rose-3, asphalt-6) partmod(asphalt-6, blurring-8) dobj(blurring-8, everything-9) quantmod(half-12, more-10) quantmod(half-12, than-11) npadvmod(away-15, half-12) det(mile-14, a-13) dep(half-12, mile-14) advmod(blurring-8, away-15) det(curtain-20, a-19) prep_behind(rose-3', curtain-20) prep_of(curtain-20, water-22)
